item.title: Prompt Tuning with DSPy
item.description: What is it and why is it needed? Last week, I spent some time writing prompts for classifying documents into a fixed set of classes based on their OCR text. I spent some time tweaking and experimenting with the prompt for the model to behave exactly how I wanted it to behave. But prompt tuning, for those who have tried it, knows how painfully daunting it is to make these models behave exactly how you’d like them to behave… that also consistently.
